review: With more screen real estate, improved durability, and faster charging, the Apple Watch Series 7 retains its crown as the best smartwatch on the market.
name: Jhon Benny

review: The Apple Watch SE drops the always-on display and a couple of advanced health sensors from the Series 6, but otherwise delivers the same winning app, fitness, and safety features for $120 less.
name: Criss Nail

review: Ideal for small wrists, the Apple smartwatch has a fashionable, jewelry-inspired design and many useful health-tracking features for a reasonable price.
name: Lady Kaka

review: Apple premium, pricey Sense smartwatch puts a focus on your well-being with the ability to measure and monitor your stress, heart rhythm, skin temperature variation, and blood oxygen saturation.
name: Ellen Dangerous

review: Thanks Apple to add cellular connectivity and doubles down on fitness features with this Watch Series
name: Kristen Tower

review: The best smartwatches do more than let you know if you're getting a call or text message on your wrist. They're everything in one: a fitness tracker for counting your steps, a digital wallet and in some cases, it can act as a phone, even if your smartphone is nowhere nearby.
name: Jonny Hamstring
